name: PageSetup

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Copies a #GtkPageSetup.

methods.name: get_bottom_margin

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the unit for the return value

methods.description: Gets the bottom margin in units of @unit.

methods.name: get_left_margin

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the unit for the return value

methods.description: Gets the left margin in units of @unit.

methods.name: get_orientation
methods.description: Gets the page orientation of the #GtkPageSetup.

methods.name: get_page_height

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the unit for the return value

methods.description:
Returns the page height in units of @unit.

Note that this function takes orientation and
margins into consideration. 
See gtk_page_setup_get_paper_height().

methods.name: get_page_width

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the unit for the return value

methods.description:
Returns the page width in units of @unit.

Note that this function takes orientation and
margins into consideration. 
See gtk_page_setup_get_paper_width().

methods.name: get_paper_height

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the unit for the return value

methods.description:
Returns the paper height in units of @unit.

Note that this function takes orientation, but 
not margins into consideration.
See gtk_page_setup_get_page_height().

methods.name: get_paper_size
methods.description: Gets the paper size of the #GtkPageSetup.

methods.name: get_paper_width

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the unit for the return value

methods.description:
Returns the paper width in units of @unit.

Note that this function takes orientation, but 
not margins into consideration. 
See gtk_page_setup_get_page_width().

methods.name: get_right_margin

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the unit for the return value

methods.description: Gets the right margin in units of @unit.

methods.name: get_top_margin

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the unit for the return value

methods.description: Gets the top margin in units of @unit.

methods.name: load_file

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: the filename to read the page setup from

methods.description:
Reads the page setup from the file @file_name.
See gtk_page_setup_to_file().

methods.name: load_key_file

parameters.name: key_file
parameters.description: the #GKeyFile to retrieve the page_setup from

parameters.name: group_name
parameters.description: the name of the group in the key_file to read, or %NULL to use the default name "Page Setup"

methods.description:
Reads the page setup from the group @group_name in the key file
@key_file.

methods.name: set_bottom_margin

parameters.name: margin
parameters.description: the new bottom margin in units of @unit

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the units for @margin

methods.description: Sets the bottom margin of the #GtkPageSetup.

methods.name: set_left_margin

parameters.name: margin
parameters.description: the new left margin in units of @unit

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the units for @margin

methods.description: Sets the left margin of the #GtkPageSetup.

methods.name: set_orientation

parameters.name: orientation
parameters.description: a #GtkPageOrientation value

methods.description: Sets the page orientation of the #GtkPageSetup.

methods.name: set_paper_size

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: a #GtkPaperSize

methods.description:
Sets the paper size of the #GtkPageSetup without
changing the margins. See 
gtk_page_setup_set_paper_size_and_default_margins().

methods.name: set_paper_size_and_default_margins

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: a #GtkPaperSize

methods.description:
Sets the paper size of the #GtkPageSetup and modifies
the margins according to the new paper size.

methods.name: set_right_margin

parameters.name: margin
parameters.description: the new right margin in units of @unit

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the units for @margin

methods.description: Sets the right margin of the #GtkPageSetup.

methods.name: set_top_margin

parameters.name: margin
parameters.description: the new top margin in units of @unit

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: the units for @margin

methods.description: Sets the top margin of the #GtkPageSetup.

methods.name: to_file

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: the file to save to

methods.description: This function saves the information from @setup to @file_name.

methods.name: to_key_file

parameters.name: key_file
parameters.description: the #GKeyFile to save the page setup to

parameters.name: group_name
parameters.description: the group to add the settings to in @key_file, or %NULL to use the default name "Page Setup"

methods.description: This function adds the page setup from @setup to @key_file.
